description:
Drinky the robot can drink you under the table, but you'll never have to worry about him getting out of control.这个名叫drinky的小机器人能在你的桌子底下喝酒，不过你完全不用担心他会喝醉酒失去控制。

The automated drinking buddy, created by South Korean inventor Eunchan Park, can down shots repeatedly, and will even raise his glass to for a hearty 'cheers,' before tossing them back.这个会喝酒的自动小家伙是一个名叫Eunchan Park的南韩发明家发明的，他能一杯接一杯的喝酒，甚至还能举起酒杯，为你的健康“干杯”，然后再仰头一饮而尽。

While the robot may seem like the perfect party favour, Drinky was developed on a much more somber basis — to fend off the loneliness of solo-drinking.这个机器人看起来似乎会成为聚会上的萌宠，不过发明家发明它的动机却不那么嗨——他的功能是帮助人们派遣自斟自饮的孤独感。

Eunchan Park was inspired to create the table-top robot after a lonely Christmas three years ago when he spent the holiday drinking by himself.Eunchan Park发明这个桌上机器人的缘由是自己的一次经历。三年前，在一个孤单的圣诞节上，他曾独自饮酒度过了那个节日。

Drinky mimics the drinking actions of a human being, motioning for a refill when his glass is empty, and then raising it to 'cheers' when it's been filled.drinky能模仿人饮酒的动作，杯中无物时还会示意再满上，杯中装满就后，还会举杯“干杯”。

Since Drinky's shots are never actually consumed, but just trickle down to the container, the alcohol is recyclable and can be used repeatedly to refill his glass (or you can just drink it yourself).其实drinky饮下的酒并不是被他喝掉了，而是顺溜进了机器人底部的容器里，所以你可以回收利用他喝掉的酒，再给他续杯（或者把酒自己喝掉吧）。

While Drinky isn't going to be hitting the markets anytime soon, the creator will be making the plans available so anyone can build their own booze-guzzling robot. 虽然drinky短期内不会投放到市场，但是他的发明者也有此想法，这样每个人都能拥有自己的陪酒机器人了。
